class="pz-footer__featured-text">Times games have captivated solvers since the launch of the Crossword in 1942. Our experts create engaging word and visual games â€” in 2014 we introduced the Mini Crossword, followed by Spelling Bee, Letter Boxed, Tiles and Vertex.
